meanings.definition: The quality or state of being boisterous.
meanings.sent1: Her boisterousnesses during the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The children's boisterousnesses could be heard from across the playground.
meanings.sent3: The boisterousnesses of the puppy running around the house was both adorable and chaotic.
meanings.sent4: The boisterousnesses of the storm outside matched the loudness of the kids inside.
meanings.sent5: The boisterousnesses of the crowd at the concert was like a wave of energy.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being loud, energetic, and rowdy.
meanings.sent1: His boisterousnesses at the game attracted a lot of attention.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of boisterousnesses, with laughter and music filling the room.
meanings.sent3: The boisterousnesses of the fans cheering for their team could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent4: The boisterousnesses of the city streets at night kept him awake.
meanings.sent5: The boisterousnesses of the celebration echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The tendency to be noisy and exuberant.
meanings.sent1: Her boisterousnesses in class often disrupted the lesson.
meanings.sent2: The boisterousnesses of the parade brought joy to all who watched.
meanings.sent3: The boisterousnesses of the birds chirping outside woke him up early.
meanings.sent4: The boisterousnesses of the market vendors trying to attract customers filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The boisterousnesses of the children playing in the park was a symphony of laughter.
